trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around May 16th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was guided outside looked up above me & saw light flash a few times - then flew str8up. Grabbed a fudgesicle & went out to the balcony. Ate some. Looked up & saw bright light above me. Pulsated a few times & slowly rose out of sight. Bright whitish purple light. It happened within minutes. Or seconds. After it left? Guess? I was in shock then i started weeping. I became very thankful & got the hello i've wanted. Before I went outside I was listening to channeled messages from the Galactic Federation of Light. The message really hit home. I needed to walk away from my computer. So i went outside.
Summary: i was guided outside looked up above me & saw light flash a few times - then flew str8up
